info.name: barnard59-sparql
info.description: SPARQL support for Barnard59 Linked Data pipelines
info.author: Thomas Bergwinkl <bergi@axolotlfarm.org> (https://www.bergnet.org/people/bergi/card#me)

operations.label: SPARQL Select
operations.comment: Runs the given CONSTRUCT query against the given endpoint parses the result.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-sparql#construct.js#default>
].

operations.label: SPARQL Select
operations.comment: Runs the given SELECT query against the given endpoint parses the result into rows of RDF/JS key-value pairs.
operations.snippet:
<> a p:Step;
  code:implementedBy [ a code:EcmaScript;
  code:link <node:barnard59-sparql#select.js#default>
].
